mapper.select: select PERIOD_DATE,TGT_VAL,TGT_PERCENT,TGT_WEIGHT_IDX, ACTUAL_VAL, ACTUAL_VAL_LAST, GROWTH_RATE from UO_TGT_DISMANT where TGT_ID = #{targetId} order by PERIOD_DATE asc
mapper.update: UPDATE UO_TGT_DISMANT T SET T.PAST_FLAG='Y' WHERE T.PERIOD_DATE <#{currentDt} AND T.TGT_ID=#{targetId}
UPDATE UO_TGT_DISMANT T SET T.Finish_Flag='Y' WHERE T.ACTUAL_VAL>=T.TGT_VAL AND T.TGT_ID=#{targetId} AND T.PAST_FLAG='Y'
mapper.select: select ID,ACTUAL_VAL from UO_TGT_DISMANT where TGT_ID = #{targetId} AND PAST_FLAG='Y' order by PERIOD_DATE asc
